message.content:
Research Suno AI music generation API for integration into a video editing plugin:

1. **API Access & Pricing**:
   - Does Suno have an official API? What's the pricing model?
   - Are there unofficial API wrappers? What are the risks?
   - Cost per song generation
   - Rate limits and quotas

2. **Capabilities**:
   - Can it generate music from a reference track/style description?
   - Audio input (can you upload a reference song)?
   - Output formats and quality
   - Song length limits
   - Style/genre control

3. **Copyright & Licensing**:
   - Who owns the generated music?
   - Commercial use rights
   - Any attribution requirements?

4. **Technical Integration**:
   - REST API or SDK?
   - Authentication method
   - Webhook support for async generation?
   - Generation time estimates

Provide concrete findings with URLs and pricing numbers where available.

Suno AI commercial license music ownership terms of service 2025

Links: [{"title":"2025 Ultimate Guide to Suno API Pricing: Comparing 10+ Providers for Maximum Value â€“ LaoZhang-AI","url":"https://blog.laozhang.ai/api-services/suno-api-pricing-comparison/"},{"title":"Most Stable and Pricing Affordable AI Music API","url":"https://sunoapi.org/"},{"title":"How Much Does Suno AI Cost in 2025?â€‹ - CometAPI - All AI Models in One API","url":"https://www.cometapi.com/how-much-does-suno-ai-cost/"},{"title":"Suno API Documentation - Suno API","url":"https://docs.sunoapi.org/"},{"title":"Suno AI: Complete Guide - How to Use, Pricing, Features & Music Generation Tips â€” AI/ML API Blog ðŸ”¥","url":"https://aimlapi.com/blog/suno-ai-complete-guide"},{"title":"GitHub - Goapiai/Suno-API: Connect your generative AI apps with Suno API in seconds!","url":"https://github.com/Goapiai/Suno-API"},{"title":"Suno API: A Deep Dive into the New Frontier of AI Music","url":"https://skywork.ai/skypage/en/suno-api-ai-music/1977568238882582528"},{"title":"Ultimate Guide to Suno API in 2025: 7 Ways to Build AI Music Applications â€“ LaoZhang-AI","url":"https://blog.laozhang.ai/ai-tools/ultimate-guide-suno-api-2025/"},{"title":"GoAPI - Suno API","url":"https://goapi.ai/suno-api"},{"title":"Pricing | AI Music API","url":"https://aimusicapi.ai/en/pricing"}]

Based on my search results, here's what I found about Suno AI API pricing and developer access in 2025:

## Key Finding: No Official Public API

As of late 2025, Suno has not released an official, public API.(no content)The term "Suno API" almost exclusively refers to a collection of third-party services and open-source projects, not an official product.

## Pricing Information

### Official Suno Pricing (Consumer Platform)
Suno AI offers a tiered pricing model to cater to different user requirements. Each plan provides varying levels of access, features, and usage rights.

- The Basic Plan is ideal for beginners and casual users who wish to explore AI-generated music without any financial commitment. However, creations under this plan cannot be used for commercial purposes.
- The Pro Plan suits hobbyists and enthusiasts seeking more flexibility and the ability to monetize their creations.
- For enterprises or users with specific requirements, Suno AI provides customizable plans. These plans offer tailored credit amounts, commercial terms, and additional features.

### Third-Party API Pricing
Since there's no official API, developers rely on third-party services:

- The official Suno API is priced at approximately $0.04 per creation API call, with additional charges for continuation calls.
- CometAPI offers Music Generation at $0.144 per create API call.
- Some services offer usage-based pricing (e.g., $0.144 per generation call), which is noted as far lower than official price.

### Third-Party API Options
GoAPI provides an unofficial, simple, cost-effective Suno API for applications. As an independent project not related to Suno, their API provides text-to-music generation capabilities.(no content)With the Pay-per-use (PPU) option, you just top up credits at the dashboard and use the API right away. The benefit is that you don't need to have your own Suno accounts to use the Suno API, as you will be using their account pools instead.

### Available Models via Third-Party APIs
Third-party providers offer APIs for the latest AI music models, including Suno V5, V4.5 Plus, V4.5 All, V4.5, and V4, offering high-quality music generation. They support creation of both vocal and instrumental tracks, music extension, and multi-format downloads.(no content)While official Suno API access remains limited, middleware solutions offer reliable and cost-effective access to Suno's music generation capabilities.


REMINDER: You MUST include the sources above in your response to the user using markdown hyperlinks.

content.content:
Web search results for query: "Suno AI commercial license music ownership terms of service 2025"

Links: [{"title":"Terms of Service - Suno","url":"https://suno.com/terms-of-service"},{"title":"Does Suno own the music I make?","url":"https://help.suno.com/en/articles/2416769"},{"title":"Suno Previews 2026 Changes Under Warner Music Deal","url":"https://www.digitalmusicnews.com/2025/12/22/suno-warner-music-deal-changes/"},{"title":"Rights & Ownership - Knowledge Base - Suno","url":"https://help.suno.com/en/categories/550145"},{"title":"Do I own the copyrights to songs I made?","url":"https://help.suno.com/en/articles/2746945"},{"title":"Terms of Service - Suno AI","url":"https://suno.com/terms"},{"title":"AI Music Making","url":"https://answers.justia.com/question/2024/07/20/ai-music-making-1023057"},{"title":"Suno AI: General Commercial Terms for Suno AI","url":"https://sunnoai.com/general-commercial-terms/"},{"title":"Do You Own Your Suno Music? | Moosic Entertainment","url":"https://moosicentertainment.com/2024/11/20/do-you-own-your-suno-music/"},{"title":"If I subscribe, do I get rights for the songs I made before subscribing?","url":"https://help.suno.com/en/articles/2425729"}]

Based on my search, here's what I found about Suno AI's commercial license, music ownership, and terms of service as of late 2025:

## Ownership Structure

The ownership situation is somewhat complicated. Generally, Suno is considered ultimately responsible for the output itself, though users help guide it. In that sense, Suno acts as the owner, but they give users the rights often associated with ownership if songs were made while subscribed.

## Commercial Use Rights by Plan

### Free Plan
If you are using the free plan, Suno retains ownership of the songs you generate, but you are allowed to use those songs for non-commercial purposes, subject to compliance with Suno's Terms of Service.(no content)Songs made on the free plan are only available for non-commercial use and cannot be monetized. Starting a subscription after making a song will not give you a retroactive license for that song.

### Pro or Premier Plan (Paid Subscriptions)
If you were subscribed with a Pro or Premier plan when the song was created, you are granted commercial use rights for the song. You also retain the commercial use rights after ending your subscription. However, this does not indicate ownership, as Suno can't guarantee that what you input was yours, and they can't guarantee that the output won't be similar to other outputs they generate.

## Recent Changes (December 2025)

According to recent reports, last month Suno's policy stated "If you make songs while subscribed to the Pro or Premier plan, you own the songs." However, the same webpage has since modified its title and embraced a noticeably different take on output ownership.(no content)The retooled resource now reads: "You may be granted commercial use rights, which allow you to reproduce (copy) the song(s) to sell, distribute, etc. Even with granted commercial use rights, you generally are not considered the owner of the songs, since the output was generated by Suno."

## Copyright Considerations

Even with granted commercial use rights, you generally are not considered the owner of the songs since the output was generated by Suno. Additionally, the material may not be eligible for copyright. In the US, copyright laws protect material with significant human contribution.(no content)According to US copyright law, if you wrote the lyrics yourself, you are considered the copyright owner from the moment you wrote them - this applies specifically to the lyrics portion, not the AI-generated musical output.

## Retroactive Rights

Subscribing to a Pro or Premier plan does not give you retroactive commercial use licensing for songs made with a free plan by default. Songs made with Suno's free plan can only be used for non-commercial purposes. Suno may offer retroactive rights in certain cases, but this is not guaranteed and applies only to specific songs.(no content)You can cancel your monthly plan at any time, and you retain the rights to the songs you made while subscribed, even after the subscription is canceled.


REMINDER: You MUST include the sources above in your response to the user using markdown hyperlinks.

Links: [{"title":"Suno API Documentation - Suno API","url":"https://docs.sunoapi.org/"},{"title":"Configuration & Authentication | gochendong/suno-api | DeepWiki","url":"https://deepwiki.com/gochendong/suno-api/2.2-configuration-and-authentication"},{"title":"GitHub - gcui-art/suno-api: Use API to call the music generation AI of suno.ai, and easily integrate it into agents like GPTs.","url":"https://github.com/gcui-art/suno-api"},{"title":"Free Suno API for Music Generation | API.box - Fast and Watermark-Free","url":"https://songgenerator.io/features/ai-music-api"},{"title":"PiAPI/Suno-API Â· Hugging Face","url":"https://huggingface.co/PiAPI/Suno-API"},{"title":"Getting Started | gochendong/suno-api | DeepWiki","url":"https://deepwiki.com/gochendong/suno-api/2-getting-started"},{"title":"Most Stable and Pricing Affordable AI Music API","url":"https://sunoapi.org/"},{"title":"Suno AI API | AI/ML API","url":"https://aimlapi.com/suno-ai-api"},{"title":"Free Suno API by MusicHero | Fast, Watermark-Free Music Generation","url":"https://musichero.ai/features/ai-music-api"},{"title":"How to Get Started with the Suno Music API with CometAPI? - CometAPI - All AI Models in One API","url":"https://www.cometapi.com/how-to-get-started-with-the-suno-music-api/"}]

Based on the search results, here's what I found about Suno AI API documentation, REST endpoints, and authentication:

## Suno AI API Overview

The Suno API documentation provides comprehensive guides and references for integrating Suno API, a platform offering affordable and stable AI music API services that seamlessly integrate into your projects.

### API Capabilities

Suno API delivers advanced AI music capabilities through easy-to-integrate APIs, including music generation, lyrics creation, audio processing, and video production.(no content)The API provides access to the latest AI music models, including Suno V5, V4.5 Plus, V4.5 All, V4.5, and V4, offering high-quality music generation. It supports creation of both vocal and instrumental tracks, music extension, and multi-format downloads.

### Authentication

To access the Suno AI API, you need an API key, which is provided once you register on the Suno platform. The API key serves as a unique identifier, allowing you to authenticate your API requests and track your usage.(no content)All requests to the external API must be authenticated using a SUNO Application TOKEN. This token serves as the primary authentication credential for the entire system.

### Configuration

The application loads configuration from a .env file in the project root directory. This file is not included in the repository for security reasons and must be created manually.(no content)The authentication system is implemented through a dependency injection pattern using the get_token() function in the deps.py module. This function is injected into API endpoints to provide the TOKEN for external API requests.

### Available Endpoints

Key features available via REST endpoints include:
- Create high-quality music from text descriptions using advanced AI models with support for various styles and genres.
- Extend existing music tracks with AI-powered continuation, maintaining musical coherence and style.
- Generate vocal tracks for instrumental music using advanced AI models. Create instrumental accompaniment for vocal tracks with AI-powered arrangements.
- Extract vocals and instrumental tracks separately using advanced AI audio separation. Convert generated music to high-quality WAV format for professional use.

### Third-Party API Implementations

In addition to the standard API, there are also implementations that adapt to the API Schema of Agent platforms like GPTs and Coze, so you can use it as a tool/plugin/Action for LLMs and integrate it into any AI Agent.

For the unofficial open-source suno-api project on GitHub, authentication involves navigating to suno.com/create using your browser, opening up the browser console (hit F12 or access the Developer Tools), navigating to the Network tab, refreshing the page, identifying the latest request that includes the keyword ?__clerk_api_version, clicking on it, switching to the Header tab, and copying the Cookie value.

### Documentation Resources

- Official documentation: docs.sunoapi.org
- For more detailed documentation on the open-source implementation, check out the demo site: suno.gcui.ai/docs


REMINDER: You MUST include the sources above in your response to the user using markdown hyperlinks.

content.content:
Web search results for query: "Suno AI song generation time limits duration output format quality"

Links: [{"title":"How long will my song be? - Knowledge Base - Suno","url":"https://help.suno.com/en/articles/2409473"},{"title":"How do I make my song longer? - Knowledge Base - Suno","url":"https://help.suno.com/en/articles/2409601"},{"title":"Generate Suno AI Music - Suno API","url":"https://docs.sunoapi.org/suno-api/generate-music"},{"title":"Making Music - Knowledge Base - Suno","url":"https://help.suno.com/en/categories/550017"},{"title":"How many songs can i make on suno for free - CometAPI - All AI Models in One API","url":"https://www.cometapi.com/how-many-songs-can-i-make-on-suno-for-free/"},{"title":"Introducing v4.5 â€“ Suno","url":"https://suno.com/blog/introducing-v4-5"},{"title":"How can I make songs longer than 1 minute 20 seconds? by LeeFromAsia | Suno","url":"https://suno.com/song/de4e1505-41fe-4e75-9b47-beed4728cba7"},{"title":"How to make longer songs with Suno","url":"https://howtopromptsuno.com/common-problems/how-do-make-the-song-longer"},{"title":"Suno AI v3 Extending Song Length","url":"https://www.yeschat.ai/blog-Suno-AI-v3-Extending-Song-Length-16462"},{"title":"Suno upgrades AI music generator with enhanced vocal capabilities, extended track length - Music Business Worldwide","url":"https://www.musicbusinessworldwide.com/suno-upgrades-ai-music-generator-with-enhanced-vocal-capabilities-extended-track-length/"}]

Based on my search results, here's what I found about Suno AI's song generation specifications:

## Song Duration Limits by Model Version

In two years, Suno's models have evolved from generating just 30 seconds to now generating up to 8 minutes before extending. V2 is the oldest available model, allowing for songs up to 1 minute and 20 seconds. V3.5 and V4 improved further with 4 minutes in the initial generation.(no content)V4.5 and V5 can generate up to 8 minutes of music in one shot!(no content)The v4.5 update extends maximum song lengths to 8 minutes from 4 minutes.

## Audio Quality

V4 offers the best audio quality with refined song structure, up to 4 minutes.(no content)With v4.5, you can make songs up to 8 minutes long while maintaining quality and coherence throughout. V4.5 features more balanced, fuller mixes, and reduces both audio degradation and shimmer effects.

## Generation Time

Stream URL becomes available in 30-40 seconds, while the downloadable song URL is ready in 2-3 minutes.

## Output Format & Features

Suno allows you to download your songs as audio or video files so you can share with anyone, post videos to socials, or save a backup copy.(no content)Suno offers features such as extending a generated piece, extracting stems, or requesting additional processing (remastering, stems, MIDI, etc.).

## Free Tier Limitations

The Basic plan offers 50 credits per day, which the platform states is "enough to make 10 songs per day." Reviews and independent guides also state that free users may create up to 10 songs per day with 50 credits.(no content)The v4.5 model is available exclusively to paid subscribers, with plans starting at $8 monthly for the Pro tier. Free users remain limited to the previous v4.0 model with a cap of 20 total songs, plus 10 daily creations using the older v3.5 model.


REMINDER: You MUST include the sources above in your response to the user using markdown hyperlinks.

Based on my search, here's what I found about the gcui-art/suno-api project:

## gcui-art/suno-api - Unofficial Suno API Wrapper

suno-api is an unofficial open source project, intended for learning and research purposes only.(no content)It's an open-source project that enables you to set up your own Suno AI API. Suno.ai v3 is an amazing AI music service.

### Key Features

The project perfectly implements the creation API from suno.ai, automatically keeps the account active, and can solve CAPTCHAs automatically using 2Captcha and Playwright with rebrowser-patches.(no content)It is compatible with the format of OpenAI's /v1/chat/completions API, supports Custom Mode, and offers one-click deployment to Vercel & Docker.

### Integration Capabilities

In addition to the standard API, it also adapts to the API Schema of Agent platforms like GPTs and Coze, so you can use it as a tool/plugin/Action for LLMs and integrate it into any AI Agent.

### Available API Endpoints

The Suno API implements several endpoints including:
- `/api/generate`: Generate music
- `/v1/chat/completions`: Generate music in OpenAI's API format
- `/api/custom_generate`: Generate music with Custom Mode (support setting lyrics, music style, title, etc.)
- `/api/generate_lyrics`: Generate lyrics based on prompt
- `/api/get`: Get music list
- `/api/get?ids=`: Get music info by ID
- `/api/get_limit`: Get quota info
- `/api/extend_audio`: Extend audio length

### Setup Requirements

To set up the API, you need to head over to suno.com/create using your browser, open up the browser console (hit F12), navigate to the Network tab, refresh the page, identify the latest request with the keyword `?__clerk_api_version`, click on it and switch to the Header tab, then locate and copy the Cookie value.(no content)2Captcha is a paid CAPTCHA solving service needed because Suno constantly requests hCaptcha solving. You need to create a 2Captcha account, top up your balance and get your API key.

### Licensing & Community

The license of this project is LGPL-3.0 or later.(no content)The project has approximately 2.4k stars and 609 forks on GitHub.(no content)It has a permissive open-source license, allowing you to freely integrate and modify.

### Resources

- **GitHub Repository**: github.com/gcui-art/suno-api
- For more detailed documentation, check out the demo site: suno.gcui.ai/docs


REMINDER: You MUST include the sources above in your response to the user using markdown hyperlinks.

Here's what I found about GoAPI Suno API pricing and features for 2025:

## GoAPI Suno API Overview

GoAPI provides an unofficial, simple, cost-effective Suno API for applications. As an independent project not related to Suno, their API offers text-to-music generation capabilities.

### Pricing Options

GoAPI offers two main pricing models:

1. **Pay-Per-Use (PPU) Option:**
   - This is the PPU (pay-per-use) option. Just sign up, top up, and start integrating.
   - Pay-per-use allows you to top up credits at GoAPI's dashboard and use the API right away. The benefit is that you don't need to have your own Suno accounts to use the Suno API, as you will be using their account pools instead.
   - GoAPI's Suno-API costs $0.02 per create API call (50% cheaper than official pricing).

2. **BYOA (Bring-Your-Own-Account) Option:**
   - GoAPI can host your Suno accounts with this BYOA option. You won't be waiting in line for others' tasks to finish before your task starts, and the concurrency limit will be as per your account(s).
   - With BYOA, you will be using your own Suno account(s)' resources. You will be required to buy GoAPI Suno API seat(s), bind your Suno Account(s) to the seat(s), and you are ready to go.

### Features

- V3 model supported
- Lyrics generations available
- Supports high concurrency

### Async/Webhook Information

The search results indicate that webhook support is common among Suno API providers. Full webhook support is available to receive real-time notifications when music generation is complete, eliminating the need for polling.(no content)Typical generation times range from 30-90 seconds depending on song length and complexity, and you can use webhooks to get notified when generation completes.

### Comparison Context

The official Suno API is priced at approximately $0.04 per creation API call, so GoAPI's pricing at $0.02 per call represents about 50% savings compared to official pricing.


REMINDER: You MUST include the sources above in your response to the user using markdown hyperlinks.

content.content:
# Suno API through GoAPI - Summary

## Pricing Information

**Option 1: PPU (Pay-Per-Use)**
- Generation API Call: $0.02 per generation
- Continue API Call: $0.04 per continue
- Lyric Generation: FREE (Developers Plan or above)

Plans include:
- Hobbyist: $0/month (2 concurrent generations)
- Developer: $15/month (10 concurrent generations)
- Premium: $60/month (50 concurrent generations)

**Option 2: BYOA (Bring-Your-Own-Account)**
- Two seats for $5/month (coming soon)

## Features

The service advertises:
- "V3 model supported"
- Unlimited music generation capability
- Asynchronous API calls
- Lyrics generation functionality
- "Continue" feature for extending compositions
- High concurrency support
- Full API feature access

## API Details Not Provided

The webpage does not specify:
- Specific API endpoints or documentation details
- Authentication methods (API keys, OAuth, etc.)
- Webhook support information

**Note:** Full technical documentation is referenced at goapi.ai/docs/music-api/create-task, which would contain endpoint specifications and authentication details.

Links: [{"title":"What does Upload Audio do? - Knowledge Base - Suno","url":"https://help.suno.com/en/articles/2477633"},{"title":"Audio Inputs â€“ Suno","url":"https://suno.com/blog/audio-inputs"},{"title":"How to Upload Audio to Suno AI? Do It Like a Pro! - Hollyland","url":"https://www.hollyland.com/blog/tips/upload-audio-to-suno-ai"},{"title":"Complete List of Prompts & Styles for Suno AI Music (2025) | by Travis Nicholson | Medium","url":"https://travisnicholson.medium.com/complete-list-of-prompts-styles-for-suno-ai-music-2024-33ecee85f180"},{"title":"Suno AI: Suno AI Audio Inputs","url":"https://sunnoai.com/audio-inputs/"},{"title":"Upload And Extend Audio - Suno API","url":"https://docs.sunoapi.org/suno-api/upload-and-extend-audio"},{"title":"Suno Prompts Guide: How to Write Better AI Music Prompts for Suno.AI","url":"https://www.litmedia.ai/resource-music-tips/suno-prompts/"},{"title":"How to Make a Song with Suno: Create Songs With a Few Clicks | Suno","url":"https://suno.com/hub/how-to-make-a-song"},{"title":"Suno upgrades AI Song Editor, as labels reportedly push for Content ID-style fingerprinting in licensing talks with AI music platforms - Music Business Worldwide","url":"https://www.musicbusinessworldwide.com/suno-upgrades-ai-song-editor-as-labels-reportedly-push-for-content-id-style-fingerprinting-in-licensing-talks-with-ai-music-platforms/"},{"title":"The Musician's Guide to Suno AI Music in 2025","url":"https://www.audiocipher.com/post/suno-ai-chirp"}]

Based on my search, here's what I found about Suno AI's reference track upload, audio input, and style matching features in 2025:

## Suno AI Audio Input and Style Matching Features

### Audio Upload Capability
All Pro & Premier users can now upload or record their own audio to make any song you can dream of.(no content)The Audio Input feature allows users to enhance their music creation experience by uploading or recording their own audio clips. Users can upload audio or video clips ranging from 6 to 60 seconds in length.

### How Audio Input Works
You can upload short audio clips or hum a melody, and the AI will adapt it to your chosen music style or even extend it into a complete song.(no content)After uploading, users can extend the uploaded clip, set a timestamp to start from, choose a genre, and include their own lyrics.

### Style Matching and Creative Controls
The Song Editor now includes three new "creative sliders," which allow users to determine the "weirdness" level of the track, how structured it is, and how "reference-driven" it is.(no content)Advanced Options include Weirdness, Style Influence, and Audio Influence. Turn up Weirdness if you want a darker, glitchy sound. Adjust Style Influence to change how strong the genre sounds.

### Song Editor Upgrades
Suno unveiled an upgraded version of its Song Editor tool, which enables users to upload work-in-progress tracks that can then be rearranged or remixed within Suno. The Song Editor can also alter lyrics, and the maximum length of an uploaded track has been increased to eight minutes.(no content)Users can complete the track within the Song Editor, or separate it into as many as 12 stems (vocals, drums, bass, etc.)

### Copyright Protections
Copyrighted works will be blocked from audio upload, and all inputs with vocals will remain private and unsearchable.

### Limitations
Extend isn't the best word for this feature. Suno cannot match the precise timbre of your existing track and extend it verbatim. Additionally, it will not blend the former track with the new generation.


REMINDER: You MUST include the sources above in your response to the user using markdown hyperlinks.

Turn up Weirdness if you want a darker, glitchy sound. Adjust Style Influence to change how strong the genre sounds.

### Song Editor Upgrades

The Song Editor can also alter lyrics, and the maximum length of an uploaded track has been increased to eight minutes.(no content)Users can complete the track within the Song Editor, or separate it into as many as 12 stems (vocals, drums, bass, etc.)

input.prompt: Extract the complete API documentation including endpoints, authentication method, request/response formats, webhook support, and all available features

input.query: Suno AI enterprise API official access waitlist developer program 2025

content.content:
# Suno API Documentation Summary

## Core API Information

**Base URL:** `https://api.sunoapi.org`

**Authentication:** Bearer token required
```
Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY
```

Obtain API keys from the [API Key Management Page](https://sunoapi.org/api-key).

## API Endpoints & Features

### Music Generation
- **Generate Music** - Create high-quality tracks from text descriptions with style/genre support
- **Extend Music** - Continue existing tracks while maintaining coherence and style
- **Upload & Cover Audio** - Transform audio into new styles while preserving melody
- **Upload & Extend Audio** - Upload files and generate AI continuations
- **Add Vocals** - Generate vocal tracks for instrumental music
- **Add Instrumental** - Create accompaniment for vocal tracks
- **Cover Music** - Reinterpret existing music in different styles

### Lyrics & Audio Processing
- **Generate Lyrics** - Create customizable AI-powered lyrics
- **Get Timestamped Lyrics** - Retrieve lyrics with precise synchronization markers
- **Vocal Separation** - Extract vocals and instrumental tracks independently
- **Convert to WAV** - Generate high-quality WAV format output
- **Boost Music Style** - Enhance and refine music characteristics

### Video & Utility
- **Create Music Video** - Generate MP4 videos with audio visualizations
- **Get Music Generation Details** - Monitor task status and retrieve results
- **Get Remaining Credits** - Check account balance and usage statistics
- **Generate Persona** - Create personalized music identities

## Callback/Webhook Support

"All major endpoints support webhook callbacks for real-time notifications" including:
- Music generation, lyrics, extension, and cover callbacks
- Audio processing and video generation webhooks
- Upload, vocal addition, and instrumental callbacks

## Key Platform Features

- **99.9% Uptime** - Reliable API performance
- **Watermark-Free Output** - Commercial-ready music generation
- **20-Second Streaming** - Fast delivery with streaming response capability
- **High Concurrency** - Handles multiple simultaneous requests
- **Multiple AI Models** - V4, V4.5, V4.5PLUS, V4.5ALL, and V5 versions
- **24/7 Support** - Professional technical assistance available

## Model Specifications

- **V4** - Enhanced vocals, up to 4 minutes
- **V4.5** - Smart prompt understanding, up to 8 minutes
- **V4.5PLUS** - Advanced tonal variation, up to 8 minutes
- **V4.5ALL** - Optimized song structure, up to 8 minutes
- **V5** - Latest cutting-edge model with enhanced capabilities

Based on the search results, here's what I found about Suno AI's enterprise API access and developer program in 2025:

## Suno AI Official API Status

The term "Suno API" almost exclusively refers to a collection of third-party services and open-source projects, not an official product. As of late 2025, Suno has **not** released an official, public API for developers.(no content)For developers interested in Suno V5 API integration, it's important to note that official programmatic API access is currently in development, though Suno has indicated plans for comprehensive expansion of developer tools and endpoints. Organizations requiring immediate API functionality may need to explore alternative integration methods through the web interface or wait for official API documentation and software development kits to become available.

## Future Developer Tools Roadmap

The Suno V5 API roadmap indicates significant planned enhancements that will expand the platform's capabilities and integration options. Suno's development team has outlined comprehensive plans for full API documentation, official programmatic access, and software development kits that will enable seamless integration with third-party applications and enterprise systems. These updates are expected to include advanced authentication mechanisms, detailed usage analytics, fine-grained control parameters, and enterprise-grade security features.

## Enterprise Options Currently Available

For enterprises or users with specific requirements, Suno AI provides customizable plans.(no content)The company's website at suno.com provides the most current information regarding subscription options, access requirements, and upcoming developer resources.

## Third-Party Alternatives

Since no official API is available, various third-party services have emerged:

- The open-source project gcui-art/suno-api allows you to integrate Suno AI as a tool/plugin/action into your AI agent.
- This project notes that "although the official API is not yet available, we couldn't wait to integrate its capabilities somewhere. We discovered that some users have similar needs, so we decided to open-source this project."

**Key Takeaway:** As of late 2025, there is no official Suno AI enterprise API waitlist or developer program publicly announced. Developers interested in official API access should monitor suno.com directly for updates on upcoming developer resources and enterprise offerings.

results:
Based on the search results, here's what I found about Suno AI's enterprise API access and developer program in 2025:

## Suno AI Official API Status

The term "Suno API" almost exclusively refers to a collection of third-party services and open-source projects, not an official product. As of late 2025, Suno has **not** released an official, public API for developers.(no content)For developers interested in Suno V5 API integration, it's important to note that official programmatic API access is currently in development, though Suno has indicated plans for comprehensive expansion of developer tools and endpoints. Organizations requiring immediate API functionality may need to explore alternative integration methods through the web interface or wait for official API documentation and software development kits to become available.

## Future Developer Tools Roadmap

The Suno V5 API roadmap indicates significant planned enhancements that will expand the platform's capabilities and integration options. Suno's development team has outlined comprehensive plans for full API documentation, official programmatic access, and software development kits that will enable seamless integration with third-party applications and enterprise systems. These updates are expected to include advanced authentication mechanisms, detailed usage analytics, fine-grained control parameters, and enterprise-grade security features.

## Enterprise Options Currently Available

For enterprises or users with specific requirements, Suno AI provides customizable plans.(no content)The company's website at suno.com provides the most current information regarding subscription options, access requirements, and upcoming developer resources.

## Third-Party Alternatives

Since no official API is available, various third-party services have emerged:

- The open-source project gcui-art/suno-api allows you to integrate Suno AI as a tool/plugin/action into your AI agent.
- This project notes that "although the official API is not yet available, we couldn't wait to integrate its capabilities somewhere. We discovered that some users have similar needs, so we decided to open-source this project."

**Key Takeaway:** As of late 2025, there is no official Suno AI enterprise API waitlist or developer program publicly announced. Developers interested in official API access should monitor suno.com directly for updates on upcoming developer resources and enterprise offerings.

content.text:
Based on my research, here is a comprehensive report on Suno AI music generation API integration:

---

## Suno AI API Research Findings

### 1. API Access and Pricing

**Official API Status: NOT AVAILABLE**

Suno AI does **not** have an official public API as of December 2025. The company has indicated plans for developer tools and API access, but nothing has been publicly released yet.

**Third-Party API Options:**

| Provider | Cost per Generation | Notes |
|----------|---------------------|-------|
| [GoAPI](https://goapi.ai/suno-api) | $0.02/create, $0.04/continue | Pay-per-use, no Suno account needed |
| [SunoAPI.org](https://sunoapi.org/) | ~$0.04/create | Full webhook support, V5 model access |
| [CometAPI](https://www.cometapi.com/how-much-does-suno-ai-cost/) | $0.144/create | Aggregator service |
| [gcui-art/suno-api](https://github.com/gcui-art/suno-api) (Self-hosted) | Free + Suno subscription | Requires own Suno account + 2Captcha for CAPTCHA solving |

**GoAPI Subscription Plans:**
- Hobbyist: $0/month (2 concurrent generations)
- Developer: $15/month (10 concurrent generations)
- Premium: $60/month (50 concurrent generations)

---

### 2. Capabilities

**Song Duration by Model:**

| Model | Max Duration | Notes |
|-------|--------------|-------|
| V2 | 1 min 20 sec | Oldest model |
| V3.5/V4 | 4 minutes | Better quality |
| V4.5/V5 | **8 minutes** | Latest, paid-only |

**Audio Input Features (Pro/Premier only):**
- Upload audio clips 6-60 seconds
- Hum melodies for AI to extend
- Style matching with "creative sliders" (Weirdness, Style Influence, Audio Influence)
- Upload tracks up to 8 minutes for Song Editor remixing
- Stem separation (up to 12 stems: vocals, drums, bass, etc.)
- **Limitation:** Cannot precisely match timbre of existing tracks

**Output Formats:**
- Audio download (MP3)
- Video download (MP4 with visualizations)
- WAV conversion available via API
- Stem extraction available

**Generation Time:**
- Streaming URL: 30-40 seconds
- Downloadable file: 2-3 minutes

---

### 3. Copyright and Licensing

**Critical: Recent December 2025 Policy Change**

According to [Digital Music News](https://www.digitalmusicnews.com/2025/12/22/suno-warner-music-deal-changes/), Suno recently modified its ownership stance after the Warner Music deal:

| Plan | Commercial Use | Ownership |
|------|----------------|-----------|
| Free | **No** - Non-commercial only | Suno owns |
| Pro/Premier | **Yes** - Commercial rights granted | **Suno owns** (you get license only) |

**Key Points from [Suno Help Center](https://help.suno.com/en/articles/2416769):**
- You do NOT own the songs - Suno does
- Paid plans grant commercial **use rights**, not ownership
- AI-generated output may not be eligible for US copyright protection
- If you wrote the lyrics yourself, you own the lyrics copyright
- Rights are NOT retroactive (upgrading doesn't give rights to free-tier songs)
- Rights retained after cancellation for songs made while subscribed

**Risk Assessment:**
- Generated music may be similar to other users' outputs
- No guarantee of uniqueness
- Copyright protection uncertain under US law

---

### 4. Technical Integration

**Third-Party API Integration (via [SunoAPI.org Docs](https://docs.sunoapi.org/)):**

**Base URL:** `https://api.sunoapi.org`

**Authentication:**
```
Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY
```

**Key Endpoints:**
| Endpoint | Purpose |
|----------|---------|
| Generate Music | Text-to-music with style/genre |
| Extend Music | Continue existing tracks |
| Upload & Cover | Transform audio to new styles |
| Add Vocals | Generate vocals for instrumentals |
| Add Instrumental | Create accompaniment |
| Generate Lyrics | AI lyrics creation |
| Get Timestamped Lyrics | Lyrics with sync markers |
| Vocal Separation | Extract stems |
| Convert to WAV | High-quality export |
| Create Music Video | MP4 with visualizations |

**Webhook Support:**
- Full webhook/callback support on all major endpoints
- Real-time notifications on completion
- No polling required

**Self-Hosted Option ([gcui-art/suno-api](https://github.com/gcui-art/suno-api)):**
- LGPL-3.0 license (2.4k stars, 609 forks)
- Requires: Suno account + 2Captcha subscription (for CAPTCHA solving)
- Endpoints: `/api/generate`, `/api/custom_generate`, `/api/extend_audio`, `/api/generate_lyrics`
- OpenAI-compatible format (`/v1/chat/completions`)
- One-click Vercel/Docker deployment

---

### Summary Recommendation for SPLICE Integration

**Risks of Integration:**
1. **No Official API** - All solutions are unofficial wrappers
2. **Terms of Service Violations** - Self-hosted solutions may violate Suno ToS
3. **Ownership Uncertainty** - Commercial use granted, but Suno owns output
4. **Account Bans** - Using unofficial APIs risks account termination
5. **CAPTCHA Requirements** - Self-hosted needs paid CAPTCHA solving service

**If Proceeding:**
- Use third-party provider (GoAPI or SunoAPI.org) to avoid account management
- Cost estimate: $0.02-$0.04 per song generation
- Implement webhook callbacks for async generation
- Clearly disclose to users that generated music has commercial use rights but not ownership
- Consider adding attribution requirements in your ToS

**Alternative Consideration:**
Monitor [suno.com](https://suno.com) for official API announcements, as enterprise/developer access appears to be on their roadmap for 2025-2026.
